description: A new technology is disrupting your industry.

subscenarios.statement: A startup has introduced a revolutionary technology that threatens your core business model.
subscenarios.leftAction: Invest heavily in R&D to develop competing technology

subscenarios.statement: Your R&D team is divided on which direction to take with product development.
subscenarios.rightAction: Pivot to entirely new product lines

subscenarios.statement: Employee morale is dropping due to uncertainty about the company's future.
subscenarios.leftAction: Hold town halls to address concerns transparently
subscenarios.rightAction: Offer retention bonuses to key employees
